title: Science Professional Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Degree Apprenticeship

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational scientific theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Provides integrated academic-vocational education for learners aiming to enter medical, legal, and technical professions. Operates on a flexible schedule in self-directed learning environments using digital devices. Learning outcomes are continuously monitored through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners integrate scientific theory and practical skills via an apprenticeship model to resolve professional workplace scenarios.
Learners can independently analyze science-related professional problems and propose feasible solutions using digital tools.
Learners improve collaboration and decision-making skills in science-related professional fields by incorporating feedback through formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
